title: Back To Top Button
shortDescription: A simple button which allows visitors to scroll the page back to the top.
longDescription:
A simple button which allows visitors to scroll the page back to the top.

## Features

- Automatic colors based off site background.
- 4 different icon styles.
- Custom shapes and positioning.
instructions: Scroll down the page and Back To Top Button will appear!
author: Cloudflare Labs

categories.description: Apps that make your website more beautiful and user friendly.
